Name: mac and cheese
Steps: boil 6 cups of water in a saucepan on medium to high heat
pour in the macaroni and cook for 7-8 minutes
feel free to taste the mac for choice of al dente or soft
drain the mac using a colander and pour back into a pot on low heat
add 4 tablespoons of unsalted butter, 1/4 cupt of milk and cheese sauce and keep mixing
once ingredients are combined, turn off the heat
sprinkle as much shredded cheese to your pleasing and mix
scoop out for serving and sprinkle with smoked paprika
Description: mac and cheese but a lil fancy
Ingredients: 1 box of Kraft Mac and Cheese original
1/2 cup of shredded cheese of choice
